### New Issue Checklist

- [ ] I updated Pearcleaner to the latest version and still observe the issue
- [ ] I searched for [existing GitHub issues](https://github.com/alienator88/pearcleaner/issues)
- [ ] OS Version: [e.g. 13.0]
- [ ] Pearcleaner Version: [e.g. 3.x.x]
